original_text: Isaiah answered, “This is the Lord’s sign to you that the Lord will do what he has promised: Shall the shadow go forward ten steps, or shall it go back ten steps?”
korean_text: 이사야가 이르되 여호와께서 하신 말씀을 응하게 하실 일에 대하여 여호와께로부터 왕에게 한 징표가 임하리이다 해 그림자가 십도를 나아갈 것이니이까 혹 십도를 물러갈 것이니이까 하니

sentences.original_text: This is the Lord's sign to you
that the Lord will do what he has promised
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 자신이 약속한 것을 이루실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Shall the shadow go forward ten steps
or shall it go back ten steps
